channel.title: Using pwnscape base?
channel.description:
Ok so im using a pwnscape base and i want to add some teleports on the magic tab , i go look clicking most and search for varrock and there is nothing named varrock so i cant change what it says , any help where i can find it is much appreciated
- lewis`.

item.title: Using pwnscape base?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:4, topic:283132”]That’s what i was talking about.
case 185:
under break;
try adding this:

if (playerRights == 3) { sM("actionbutton: "+actionButtonId+""); }
Works for me.
When you find the button id on clickingmost.java then u edit the tele coords
I hope that helped[/quote]

O right , thanks …I dont usually use this in deltascape.

[quote=“freeky, post:5, topic:283132”]it’s something like this

		case 4150: // catherby teleport 
			c.triggerTele(2378+misc.random(3),3434+misc.random(3), 0);
			break;

that is the catherby teleport not sure which one it is. u can change the 2378 to what ur x coord is and u can change the 3434 to ur y coord.[/quote]

Thanks for the case.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 11:04:59 am[/size][hr]Yeah it dosent work , im sure its different for deltas and i was right

its clickingmost and text handler.

Read full topic

item.title: Using pwnscape base?
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

it’s something like this

		case 4150: // catherby teleport 
			c.triggerTele(2378+misc.random(3),3434+misc.random(3), 0);
			break;

that is the catherby teleport not sure which one it is. u can change the 2378 to what ur x coord is and u can change the 3434 to ur y coord.

Read full topic

item.title: Using pwnscape base?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

That’s what i was talking about.
case 185:
under break;
try adding this:

if (playerRights == 3) { sM("actionbutton: "+actionButtonId+""); }
Works for me.
When you find the button id on clickingmost.java then u edit the tele coords
I hope that helped

Read full topic

item.title: Using pwnscape base?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:2, topic:283132”]teleport there, do ::mypos
get the coords and try searching them
or you could add on case 185: when you click to send a message with button id, you search button id there and ure done.[/quote]

What i am trying to do is add teleports to magic tab by replacing the varrock telleport with something like “train” and that “train” telleports telleing you to a training area that iv made.

Im using a delta base btw (pwnscape is delta)

Read full topic

item.title: Using pwnscape base?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

teleport there, do ::mypos
get the coords and try searching them
or you could add on case 185: when you click to send a message with button id, you search button id there and ure done.

Read full topic
